long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to EcoHub, the premier extension for all your environmental, nature, and climate update needs. EcoHub transforms your browsing experience by integrating seamlessly with Bing for effortless web searches, while providing direct access to your go to websites.

Privacy and Data Usage:
EcoHub prioritizes your privacy. We collect anonymized data on Personal, Usage, and Search activities, strictly to improve your educational journey and refine our offerings. Dive into our detailed Privacy Policy for a clear understanding of our practices: 

https://ecohubnewsext.com/privacypolicy/
https://ecohubnewsext.com/aboutus/
https://ecohubnewsext.com/contactus/
https://ecohubnewsext.com/eula/
https://ecohubnewsext.com/termsandconditions/

By clicking 'Add to chrome', I accept and agree to installing EcoHub Extension and setting the New tab to https://www.bing.com is that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
